public class MoviesActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity implements MoviesAdapter.OnClickListener
A tab the user can use to search for a movie and find which theaters in the Ames area show that movie.

    MoviesActivity.SwipeGestureDetector
    SwipeGestureDetector is an inner class extending GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener to handle swipe gestures detected by the GestureDetector.

  • Method Details

    • onCreate

      protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Sets up page for user viewing. This includes button clicking instructions, retrieving saved data (email). The user interacts with the toolbar on top to visit whatever tab they like, search bar to look up a movie and where they are showing in theaters, swipe either left or right to go to a neighboring tab, and move and click a shortcut button to the social tab.
      Overrides:
      onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
      Parameters:
      savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in onSaveInstanceState(Bundle)

    • onTouchEvent

      public boolean onTouchEvent​(android.view.MotionEvent event)
      This method dispatches touch event to the GestureDetector and is called when a touch screen event was not handled by any of the views under it. This method is used to detect swipe gestures.
      Overrides:
      onTouchEvent in class android.app.Activity
      Parameters:
      event - The MotionEvent object containing full information about the event.
      Returns:
      boolean Return true if this event was consumed or super.onTouchEvent(event) otherwise.

    • getMovies

      private void getMovies​(org.json.JSONObject requestBody)
      Makes a request to the server to retrieve a string of all the movies currently showing in theaters.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - a JSONObject that holds the user's email.

    • getMovieSearch

      private void getMovieSearch​(org.json.JSONObject requestBody)
      Makes a String Request to the server to retrieve a string of the searched movie object.
      Parameters:
      requestBody - holds the user's email.
